channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Controlled crossing point changing too quickly, 14th January
item.description:
The crossing point in Hubble Road changes at the same time a pedestrian presses it. The problem being that this is now causing traffic to back up on to the A40 at peak times as so many single pedestrians cross one after the other each pressing the crossing button. A delay needs to be added to the Crossing Point to "collect" pedestrians in groups and to allow a greater free flow of traffic (even if this is just adjusted at peak times).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hubble Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep craters, 14th January
item.description:
Deep craters at the junction. Precious report said they had been fixed and they have not! Please fix asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Hatherley Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two drains now stand proud/pothole around them & surface nearby also potholed, 14th January
item.description:
Please assess area & mend thanks . x

item.title: Large craters, 14th January
item.description:
Larger gouges/craters in the road. Unavoidable right by the exit to the petrol station. Previous report said they had been dealt with but they have not! Please fix asap as a danger to cars!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Rubbish left outside 3 Meadow Court, 14th January
item.description:
Resident of 3 Meadow Court keeps leaving items on the pavement outside his property. Current items have been there for a few weeks and are a trip hazard at night due to no street lights in that area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alderton Road, Gretton, Tewkesbury

item.title: Previously repaired pothole, 14th January
item.description:
You have dumped tarmac in these holes several times but you don't repair them. Heavy vehicles, water and ice just break up your repair and bring back the holes. Please repair them properly. You publicise Gloucestershire's recognition for road repairs but it means nothing if all the repairs are like this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lamp no 7 obscured by tree foliage, 14th January
item.description:
Nearest property 36 Delavale Road, GL54 5HN. I have spoken to the house owner about this problem but he is a very elderly person and has taken no action to trim the tree back. As a result of the tree foliage the street lamp is ineffective especially left and right of the lamp in addition to below. Very severe trimming back will be necessary to alleviate the problem.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Delavale Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 14th January
item.description:
Problem branch on tree - Whilst walking my dog along Reddings Road (The Reddings) I noticed a large branch of a tree that I think may be unsafe. It looks like it has been affected by friction from overhead cables. The tree itself (a horse chestnut I believe) looks in good condition, but Iâ€™m concerned if the branch (which overhangs the road) were to fall on someone it could cause injury. So can someone please arrange to inspect and remove the branch.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 14th January
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet
